content: * to * to end fold the center 34 cm of the handle in half and sew it with the same wool yarn stripy felted mini bag 3 felting and finishing wash bag and handles in a washing machine until they shrink to your preferred bag size sample shown after 40-min wash cycle at warm temperature approx 2030% shrinkage finished bag size without handles  height 18 cm  14 cm  diameter 20 cm  13 cm sew handles to the top band and itʼs done yarns korean daiso 100% wool yarn 35g green 31g navy 57g stripy felted mini bag 4 abbreviations abbreviation meaning co cast on bobble bind off sts stitches k knit p purl stripy felted mini bag 5 abbreviation meaning pm place marker round s round s rs right side ws wrong side k2tog knit 2 stitches together right-leaning decrease ssk slip slip knit left-leaning decrease stripy felted mini bag 6
